Invocation (upon receipt of the loan) fo.ARABIC_TEXT: ((بارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ فِي أَهْلِكَ وَمَالِكَ، إِنَّمَا جَزَاءُ السَّلَفِ الْحَمْدُ وَالأَدَاءُ)).
Invocation (upon receipt of the loan) fo.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Barakal-lahu laka fee ahlika wamalik, innama jaza-os-salafil-hamdu wal-ada'.)
Invocation (upon receipt of the loan) fo.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (May Allah bless for you, your family and wealth. Surely commendation and payment are the reward for a loan.)
